message:
Hello guys, 
     Does any one used an open source E-Marketing with .NET ?
I found many resources but i need your recommendations pls. , and if you have a previous experience with one of those or any one else it'll be great :) .

- If there is a good one not free, but i'll getting the source code also will be good

1 - http://www.nopcommerce.com

2- http://www.smartstore.com/net/en

3- http://aspxcommerce.codeplex.com/releases/view/87906

4- http://code.google.com/p/sutekishop

5- http://www.dotshoppingcart.com
story: Sameh Saeed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: nopCommerce - ASP.NET Open-source Ecommerce Shopping Cart Solution
caption: nopcommerce.com
description: nopCommerce is the open-source eCommerce solution. nopCommerce is available for free. It has everything you need to get started in selling physical and digital goods over the internet.

data.message: Is that mean no one have any idea?

I know nopcommerce only, And it's amazing in the source code structure & the design/architecture it uses (cutting edge technologies)
but I didn't have the change to dive deep in its source code
So is it easy to do some modifications and customizations
Yes if you're familiar with Entity Framework code first & Asp.Net MVC
